attributes.action: Make election manifestoes a legally-binding contract with the electorate.
attributes.additional_details: We are heartily sick of manifestoes that contain promises which the party concerned either has no intention of keeping, or which include deliberately misleading statements about what is actually intended.
attributes.background: Introduce an element of compulsion to ensure that manifestoes contain only clear and unambiguous promises which must be implemented exactly as stated and in full - with substantial financial penalties for failure to do so and possibly custodial sentences for deliberate non-fulfilment or dishonesty.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700035
